alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 05 at 3:57AM MST until March 05 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. The strongest winds will occur across the southern part of Pueblo county. * WHERE...Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
